attributes.action: Make St.David's day a Bank Holiday.
attributes.additional_details: Welsh people around the world wear one or both of Wales's national emblems - a daffodil and a leek. Special concerts and parades are also held in St David's honour. We should be given a bank joliday to celebrate our nations heritage.
attributes.background: St.Andrews and St.Patrick's days are bank Holidays, so should St.Davids day be. In order to help keep welsh culture alive.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599066
